#text=Yesterday , I went to the bus stop .
#text=I waited for the bus with a few others .
#text=When I got on , I scanned my bus pass on the bus pass scanner and then took my seat .
#text=The bus was not crowded , so I was able to take a seat near the front .
#text=I sat quietly , playing with my cellphone .
#text=Others stared around or talked quietly amongst themselves .
#text=A bell rang every few blocks to indicate someone wanting to get off .
#text=The bus would stop , let people off , and let new people on .
#text=The bus started to get crowded so I offered my seat to an older woman .
#text=She thanked me for the polite etiquette .
#text=I saw my stop coming up , so I pulled the lever and the bell rang again .
#text=The bus stopped a few moments later .
#text=I thanked the bus driver for his services and exited the bus .
